description.value:
Ensures Cooperation. Can be detonated by remote trigger, has 1-10km range although conditions can limit this. On Activation collar explodes, wearer is instantly killed, inflicts 1d10 Explosive Damage with 3 metre range. Remote Trigger can also disarm the collar. Removing Collar without it requires -20 Tech-Use, 3+ DoF causes collar to explode.

Requirements

Can be set to automatically trigger of wearer goes outside control range.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 55 T
